package testing

import (
	"github.com/go-chi/chi/v5"
)

// GENERATED BY CODEGEN.

func main() {
	r := chi.NewRouter()

	r.Mount("/test_table_1", khttp.LCRUD{
		List:   khttp.GetHandler(repoTestTable1.List),
		Create: khttp.JsonHandler(TestTable1Svc.Create),
		Read:   khttp.ParamIntHandler("test_table_1_id", repoTestTable1.OneByID),
		Update: khttp.JsonIntHandler("test_table_1_id", TestTable1Svc.Update),
		Delete: khttp.ParamIntHandler("test_table_1_id", TestTable1Svc.Delete),
	})
	r.Mount("/test_table_2", khttp.LCRUD{
		List:   khttp.GetHandler(repoTestTable2.List),
		Create: khttp.JsonHandler(TestTable2Svc.Create),
		Read:   khttp.ParamIntHandler("test_table_2_id", repoTestTable2.OneByID),
		Update: khttp.JsonIntHandler("test_table_2_id", TestTable2Svc.Update),
		Delete: khttp.ParamIntHandler("test_table_2_id", TestTable2Svc.Delete),
	})
}

// ^^ END OF GENERATED BY CODEGEN. ^^
